name: Final Resistance
description:
Defend your castle! Kill all the monsters and welcome the dawn of victory! Final Resistance is a time-based defense strategy casual game, where you make your army stronger by making choices on talents and forging equipment, in order to hold onto the last fortress of humanity.

There is no retreat, only a battle against the odds. Your only option is to fight with all your might, giving everything to defend your castle, which is also the last hope for humanity.

The game consists of 2 phases:
Preparation Phase: Within a limited time, collect resources, build defensive weapons, forge equipment, and arm your knights to the fullest.
War Phase: Utilize the arrow towers of your castle, send out your soldiers, and do everything possible to defend your castle.

An independent game that races against time, bringing you the experience of intense and thrilling castle defense battles!

Game Features:

Possess dozens of equipment, with different grades. Each legendary equipment has its unique special effect.
Each basic unit will bring you their special talent choices after a certain number of defense battles. Use different talent combinations to strengthen your knights in different ways.
Controls:

Use W, A, S, D to control the game camera.
Use the number keys 1 and 2 to control basic units such as "peasants, instructors, chefs, blacksmiths" for resource collection and equipment forging
